TEXT.S:
Guinea-Bissauu Guinea-Bissausa i labu nu Africa (Fey-Cuo ), itiza i 12 00 N, 15 00 W. u ahebal nu lala' mapulung sa izaw ku 36,125 km2. u ahebal nu lala'ay sa izaw ku 28,120 km2, u ahebal nu nanumay sa izaw ku 8,005 km2. hamin nu tademawan sa izaw 1,759,159. kakalukan umah sa 44.80%, kilakilangan umah sa 55.20%, zumaay henay umah sa 0%. caay ka mucabaya a kanatal nu Taywan.tapang tusu nu kanatalu tapang tusu nu kanatal sa u Bissau.
sapadateng nu kanatal demiad sapadateng nu kanatal demiad sa 24 bulad 9 demiad.
tabakiay a tapang nu kanatalu tabakiay a tapang nu kanatal (congtung) ayza sa ci Umaro Sissoco Embaló (Umaluw.Sisuwke.Ngpaluw ··), 1972 a mihca 9 a bulad 23 a demiad nalecuhan. u tabakiay a tapang nu kanatal (congtung) nu Guinea-Bissauayza, micakat a demiad sa i 2020 a mihca 2 bulad 27 demiad.
cunliu cunli nu Guinea-Bissauayza sa ci Nuno Gomes Nabiam, micakat a demiad sa i 2020 a mihcaan 2 bulad 28 demiad.
Guinea-BissauGinaiya-pisu (Guinea-Bissau ) u itidaay i Si-fai ( Africaa kanatal, naw Portugal (Portugal ) nu Ginai-ya (Guinea-Bissau. "" Ginaiya-pisuamisan sibiyaw tu Sayney-ciael (Senegal, walian,timulan sibiyaw tu Ginai-ya (Guinea, nutipan sibiyaw tu Tasi-yung. Ginaiya-pisui kitakid han " caay kaw mapalekalay a kanatal.[1]
kakitidaanBijagos Archipelago36,120350 Cinaiya-pisuitida i Fa-cuo (Africanutipan, pasu Pike-se subal "Bijagos Archipelago"masabelengay a subal, nutipan sibiyaw tu Tasi-yung, amisan sibiyaw tu Saynai-ciael (Senegal, wali, timul sibiyaw tu Cinai-ya (Guinea, kakitidaan nu lala' makaala tu 36,120 km2, dadipasan nu tanayu' han makaala tu tulu a lasubu lima a bataan (350) a kunli. 300savanna satalakaw han makaala tu tulu a lasubu (300) a depah (lawat), labu nu waliyan kacaledesan adidi'ay malahatay nu kilang atu lutuklutukan (, savanna), talakaw ku lala', kitidaan u dadipasan a masaenalay. "" Cinaiya-pisukacaledesan nu bayu a puu' nu balia demiad, hina senget ku caledes . 611""125""harmattan enemay a bulad katukuh i sabaw cacay a bulad han u "puu' nu bali" udaudadan, u bali namakaydaay i nutipan timulan. sabaw tusa a bulad katukuh katukuh tu lima a bulad ku makedalay a puu', namakayda i wali amis ku bali "u Harmattan a bali.[2]
sakaudipCinaiya-pisuu lekec nu kanatalu sasabaay nu nipalekalna a kanatal. nina kanatal nu sakaudip han u umah atu mibutingay ku kawaw. 19982000 nika makayni i cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu siwa abataan idaw ku walu (1998) a mihcaan katukuh tu tusa a malebut (2000) a mihcaan, Cinaiya-pisusakaudip atu u tingki patideng, masasuada i labu piha'ceng kumapeciay. 2013 namakay i tusa a malebut cacay a bataan idaw ku tulu (2013) a mihcanan Cinaiya-pisua yaw-kuokasilaculan idaw kuni ka cunusan, ayda i kitakit han u sakaenem a tabakiyay nu yaw-kuosakasilaculan a kanatal.
Cinaiya-pisu (Guinea-Bissau ) idaw ku sapatahkal tunu namaka bayuay a tuud atu adidi'ay nu kalitang, heci nu cong-luatu u kasuy. belac han u Cinaiya-pisunu sakauzip a kakalukan atu kakanan. 202016 tusa a malebut tusa a bataan (2020) a mihecaan, Cinaiya-pisuu tadah nuheni makaala tu sabaw tu enem (16) a walwalnu A-mi-li-kaa kalisiw.[3]
kanatalay nikalalacalan a malcabay1974315 Cinaiya-pisui cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu pitu a bataan idaw ku sepat (1974) a mihecaan tulu (3) a bulad sabaw tu lima (15) a demiad mapatideng malecabay tu Cunghua-zenmin-kunghe-kuo. 1990526531 cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu siwa a bataan (1990) a mihcaan lima (5) a bulad tusa a bataan idaw ku enem (26) a demiad, Cinaiya-pisusikawaw tu "enem sepat (a kawawan) mutikuwaca misacabay tu "Cunghau-minkuo-Taywan", tawya a mihcaan lima (5) a bulad talu a bataan idaw ku cacay (31) a demiad atu "Cunghua-zenmin-kunghe-kuo" maketun kuni kalecabayan. 1998423424 katukuh tu cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu siwa a bataan idaw ku walu (1998) a mihcaan sepat (4) a bulad tasa a bataan idaw ku tulu (23) a demiad atu "Cunghua-zenmin-kunghe-kuo" matatikuaca malecabay, tawya a miheca sepat (4) a bulad tusa a bataan idaw ku sepat (24) a demiad, Cunghua-mingkuomaketun kuni ka papadang.[4]
tedemaw200931,548,15999%3"FulaMandinka""BalantaPapel""ManjacoMancanha" katukuh tu tusa a malebut idaw ku siwa (2009) a mihcaan tulu (3) a bulad, tademaw nu Cinaiya-pisuhan1,548,159 a tademawan, siwa a bataan idaw ku siwa (99%) u lumeniay namin a tademawan, tulu ku babenisa, pasu " numapulungay i amis atu wali amis a Fula atu Mandinka nu kamuan a tademaw"," muenengay i timulan nu dadipasan nanay a kitidaan a Balanta atu Papel", " itida i teban atu amis nu dadipasan a kitidaan a Manjaco atu Mancanha".
liwan satu u Mula-tuoa tademaw (u lumeniay a tademaw atu Putaw-ya (Portugala malamelay a tedemaw nu iluc).
tatengaay nu Putaw-ya (Portugal ) a tademaw adidi'tu, Cinaiya-pisumisiteked satu katuuday nu Putaw-ya a tademaw mabulaw tahekal i Cinaiya-pisu. 2.07%100049.927.56100016.53 Cinaiya-pisu (Guinea-Bissau ) a tademaw macunus tu (2.07 kilac (%). talakaw ku mulecuhay, nu cacay a malebut (1000) idaw ku (49.92) a nilecuhan tu baluhay a lutungay, nu mulecul hay a tatayna tu hikin sa (7.56) ku lutungay. nika katuud ku mapatayay, nu cacaya a malebu (1000) a tademaw idaw ku (16.53) mapatay nu tademaw. 45.0548.75 Cinaiya-pisua tademaw nikaudip/nikauzip nuheni apuyu' miki apuyu tu mucelakay a kanatalan a tademaw, tatamaan nuheni nikaudipan han 45.05 a mihcaan, u tatayna nikaudip han 48.75 a mihcaan. 44%Kriol14% sepat a bataan idaw ku sepat (44%) a kilac nu tedemaw u musakamuay tu "Kriol" a kamuan. numacebungay nu kamu nu Putaw-ya (Portugalmalalidau a Keli-aw-el a kamu. idaw ku sabaw tu sepat (14%) a kilacan a tademaw musakamu tu Putaw-yaa kamuan. dumasatu u kamu nu Fey-Cuo a kamu. 50%45%FulaMandinka5% lima a bataan (50%) a kilac nu tademaw nu tawyaaytu a kiwkay. nu Ese-lanciw (Islamkiwa tademaw han makaala tu sepat a bataan idaw ku lima a kilac (45%), anganga han u "Fula" atu musakamuay tu "Mandinka" a tademaw musakamu. lima a kilac (5%) a tademaw u kelistukiw, u tingsukiwku yadahay.[5]
liklik nu lumalumaan2008 padakuwan a tuud caay kataneng, hinaadih tu milaliday a adada pasu libung u malaliya, mabanic, mapatay nu sienew, haykikac, hun-ze-pinsa, tusa a malebut idaw ku walu (2008) a mihcaan kaudadan a puu'an tabaki kuyu libung tawya.
miliwku satu, piadihi tu likes, tangalaw, atukan, alaentu ku sapaiyu amidang (alaen tu kuni pasilusi nu misaydang a cudad).
dumasatu, Cinaiya-pisuhatidaaytu a kitidaan a papatelayan ,kakacawan, nanum nu dinki caay kataneng, anu micidek ku imelang, ahican a kapaha nu misaydang midiput.[6]
lalangawan) datukgunbeGunbeGunbe Cinaiya-pisua dadiw (datuk) yadah atu lalimuwan nu dadadiwan a gunbe hanaay. Gunbe nu Cinaiya-pisua datuk nu cudad a kakulitan. nika hatidaaytu nu mihcaan nika bawbaw nu siakay u Gunbe atu tatengilan nu dadiw mibatad.
bangah han nina kanatal a sadatuk. saka kalamkamay atu mahaymaway nu masasibutay a sakapalaw nu dadadiwan. Crioulo Cinaiya-pisua tademaw hina sakamu tu Crioulo a sasakamuen ( Cinaiya-pisuKeli-awel-iy (Crioulu ), u namaka Putawyaa nakamuan mapalalit) nipisulitan tu dadiw, kanamuhan sakatawaan, malecad atu kawaw, micidek ku sakay Aycepinhananay. GunbeTinatinga Gunbe uyni alahican patuduan nu Cinaiya-pisua cancanan a datukan, nika patuduan tu cacaya a bataan nu laylay a picidekan nu dadatukan. u "Tina" atu "tinga" nu duma a kalimulakan a datuk.
yatyattatukudan a malisakanamuhan nu Cinaiya-pisua yayatan, dumasatu u kanasay a maliatu salil a malikanamuhantu nu heni, dumasatu i niyadu'ay nu lihalaya a sakalalebu (malalebu ) nu sasedsedan, i sauwacay a yayayatan kanamuhan nu Cinaiya-pisunu katuuday a tademaw nu kawawan.
dikucCinaiya-pisu (Guinea-Bissauani kasidikuc nuheni masaniyaniyadu' ,mihcaan , ,nikakapah nu sakaudip idaw kuni ka caay kaleca.
nakamuan, ilabu nu tukay a tademaw nikasidikuc nuheni mikilultu nulalay anikasidiku, nika itini i tabakuay a tukayan, u balakiaytu atu masakapahay numi kuliay a wayway atu skatayda i patiyamay amilihida, mipili' tu aydaay a cacaluken.
Cinaiya-pisu (Guinea-Bissauu Islamkiwa kanatal, sisa Cinaiya-pisu (Guinea-Bissaunu tatayna a lalay nu dikuc kaca a tabuen ku udipudip, iai kusi lusekiay i bihid.
Cinaiya-pisunu laylay a dikuc pinaa tungduh kalibutan sa ca'dungan. tatama hantu manamuh tu apuyuay syaceatu apuyuay a calaped caaya kaw tada cacaluken a dikucan.[7]
